pages.text: hyn dakhaluu ealayh fqalu: slamana; fard ealayhim alslam, thuma qddam lahum altaeam falam yaklu, qal: 'iinaa minkum fzewn
qalt almalayikat lh: la tfze 'inna jina nubashiruk bwld kthyr aleilm baldyn, hu 'ishaq
qal 'iibrahim mtejbana: abshshartmwny balwld, wa'ana kabir wzwjty kdhlk, fabi'ayi aejwbt tbshshirwnny?
qalu: bshsharnak bialhaqi aldhy aelmana bih allh, fala takun min alyaysyn 'ana yualid lk
qal: la yyys min rahmat rabih 'iilaa alkhatiuwn almnsrfwn ean tariq alhq. qal: fama al'amr alkhatir aldhy jitum min 'ajalih -ayha almrslwn- min eind allh?

qalu: 'iina allah 'arsalna l'ihlak qawm lut almushrikin aldaaliyn 'iilaa lwtana wa'ahlah almuminin bh, falan nhlkhm wsnnjyhm ajmeyn, lkn zawjatih alkafrt qadayna bi'amr allah b'ihlakha mae albaqin fi aledhab

flma wasal almalayikat almursalun 'iilaa lwt, qal lhm: 'iinakum qawm ghyr merwfyn ly

qalu: la takhaf, f'inna jina bialeadhab aldhy kan yashuku fih qawmak wala yusaddiqwn, wjynak bialhaqi min eind allh, wa'iinaa lsadqwn, fakhruj min baynihim wmek 'ahlak almwmnwn, baed murur juz' min allyl, wsr 'ant wra'hm; lialaa ytkhlf minhum ahd fynalh aledhab, wahdharuu 'ana yaltafit minkum ahd, wasreu 'iilaa hayth 'amarakum allh; litakunuu fi makan amyn

wawhyna 'iilaa lut 'ana qawmak mstasalwn balhlak ean akhiruhum eind tulue alsbh
wja' 'ahl madinat lut 'iilaa lut hin ealimuu biman eindah min aldywf, wahum farihun yastabshirun bdywfh; lyakhdhwhm wyfelu bihim alfahsht
qal lahum lwt: 'iina hwla' dayfi wahum fi hmayty fala tfdhwny, wkhafu eiqab allh, wala tterdu lhm, ftwqewny fi aldhuli walhwan b'iydhaykm ldywfy

qal qwmh: 'awalam nanhak 'ana tdyif 'ahadana min alealmyn; lanna nurid minhum alfahsh?
